articles.author: Benjamin Pope
articles.title: How we sharpened the James Webb telescope’s vision from a million kilometres away - The Conversation
articles.description: The only Australian hardware on board the legendary telescope is starting to fulfil its duties.
articles.content: After Christmas dinner in 2021, our family was glued to the television, watching the nail-biting launch of NASAs US$10 billion (AU$15 billion) James Webb Space Telescope. There had not been such a le… [+6118 chars]
